skillTree.name: Steppe Horse
skillTree.description: Wild stallions that are ferocious and agile. Most are used by Kislev's horse archers.

skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Ice Shard
skillTree.description: A mighty spike of the hardest ice blasts forth to impale ranks of enemies like a well-aimed cannonball from below.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Glacial Blast
skillTree.description: This eldritch explosion propels lacerating shards of ice outwards, devastating anyone caught in its deadly squall.

skillTree.name: Forbidden Knowledge
skillTree.description: Being a man in a woman's world has driven Vladimir to find every scrap and piece of knowledge that he can, knowledge that he brings forth at Boris' side.

ui_effects.description: Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit
Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit
Redirects projectiles back towards the firing unit

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Missile Mirror"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Missile Mirror Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Missile Mirror Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Chilling Aura
skillTree.description: As if the enemy were caught in a blizzard or wading through treacle, the ice-cold aura slows any unit within range to a near-standstill.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Hailstorm Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Gust of True Flight Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Gust of True Flight Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Gust of True Flight"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gust of True Flight Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gust of True Flight Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Swiftwing Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Biting Wind"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Biting Wind Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Biting Wind Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Explosion does not affect friendly troops
Explosion does not affect friendly troops
Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hawks of Miska"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hawks of Miska Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Hawks of Miska Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Blizzard Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Unit
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Vladimir Stormbringer
backgroundSkills.description: A wielder of Ice Magic, a native form of Magic practised in the northern regions of Kislev, he is able to produce deadly spells of ice and cold. The last thing he remembers is helping the Grudgebringers fight undead, this does not seem to be the same world. Ursun is in pain and this may be the source of his mysterious appearance in this familiar yet unknown world.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Blizzard Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Hailstorm Upgraded"
